item.title: Could use some help
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:2, topic:154086”]Replace your code with this:

case 9154: //Log out { logout(); savemoreinfo(); savecharbackup(); savechar(); } break;

~Armo :P[/quote]

Hay, post logout method?.. Cause thats kinda what mine looked like, before i editted. Lol

item.title: Could use some help

@dragonchain wrote:

Replace your code with this:

case 9154: //Log out { logout(); savemoreinfo(); savecharbackup(); savechar(); } break;

item.title: Could use some help
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hey, i’ve been workingon something, that wont let you loggout during combat.

You cannot logout during combat!! ’

Here is whats in the loggout case?..

case 9154: //Log out
		if(inCombat) {
			sendMessage("You cannot loggout during combat!");
}
Boolean = true;
Boolean = true;
Method();
Method();
Method();
Method();
break;

Obviously, the methods and booleans are different… But, it’s something like that, on every source. And it’s not working for me. Anyone know why?..

And yes i’ve tried…

if (inCombat) {
sendMessage("You cannot loggout during combat!");
} else if (!inCombat) {
//Rest here.
}
break;

Read full topic
